subject: Missing Item
description_text:
Hello. I ordered a Plus X + Pedal Plate on Amazon and they forgot to send
the pedal plate with the package. I want to avoid returning the product
since it is a long wait to receive a new one.

How long will it take to receive the pedal plate? I will not be home after
January 9th so I need to know before it gets shipped out and the delivery
ETA is after I am away from home.

My amazon order number is 113-6582872-9104222

Thank You,
Dinnelky Tavarez
